entities.description: The specific date when the data was recovered.
The count of occurrences without applying any weights.
The percentage representation of the unweighted frequency.
Range of values indicating missing data.

relationships.description: Associates each survey response with the date it was recovered.
Relates the survey data to its unweighted frequency count.
Indicates the percentage representation of the unweighted frequency in the survey data.
Specifies the range of missing values in the survey data.
